properties.title: Spain: Wildfire - Castilla y Leon (region wide) - 10/08/2025
properties.location: Carucedo, El Bierzo, León, Castile and León, Spain
properties.description:
**Spain: 400 displacements (evacuated), 10 August - 10 August**    
 According to the Government Sub-delegation in León, 400 residents from Carucedo were evacuated by the Civil Guard due to wildfires.   
 [Antena 3 - 10 August 2025](https://www.antena3.com/noticias/sociedad/ultima-hora-incendios-espana-directo-1500-vecinos-desalojados-fuego-avila-pueden-regresar-sus-casas-aunque-sigue-activo_2025081068983f186d08be7a8a4b9b8a.html)

properties.title: Flood - Angermanalven Basin, Jämtland, Sweden
properties.description:
The NASA Global Flood Model has issued a Flood Warning for August 12, 2025, 06:45:47 UTC through August 14, 2025, 03:12:14 UTC for Angermanalven Basin, Jämtland, Sweden.
It is estimated that 5,570 people, 2,610 households, and $961 Million (USD) of infrastructure\* are within the affected area(s). Exposure estimates will be refined as additional data from official sources becomes available.
\*The cost represents the total replacement value of the infrastructure.
